meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a peony.
meanings.sent1: The paeonic petals of the flower were a vibrant pink.
meanings.sent2: Her garden was filled with paeonic blooms in various colors.
meanings.sent3: The paeonic scent of the perfume filled the room with a pleasant aroma.
meanings.sent4: The paeonic beauty of the landscape took her breath away.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the paeonic essence of the flower in his painting.

meanings.definition: Resembling a peony in appearance or fragrance.
meanings.sent1: The cake was decorated with paeonic frosting that looked like flower petals.
meanings.sent2: The fabric had a paeonic pattern that reminded her of blooming peonies.
meanings.sent3: The paeonic candle not only looked pretty but also smelled delightful.
meanings.sent4: Her dress had a paeonic design that made her feel like a walking garden.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with a paeonic aroma that made everyone feel relaxed.
